description:
These are the basic utilities and tools that I install on a new development machine or VM.
		
			This package was inspired by and modeled on Alan Stevens' Windows Utilities package (http://chocolatey.org/packages/alanstevens.utils)

			This package only contains dependencies to other packages. Please review each dependency to understand the license and usage instructions.
displayName: Peter Provost's Windows Dev Tools All-in-one Package
summary: My set of utilities and tools for a new development machine.
author: Peter Provost
